text: haey brasenbae a l laoh baektoulay nouv leaphosakkar champoh khnhom teanglay robsa trong puokke pitchea br pru td lmeusa now leu phendei nih cheaminkhan . kabonde trongbratan tam kamrit del trong mean chetnea . pitabrakd nasa trong mha doeng mha kheunh champoh ( tongveu) khnhom teanglay robsa trong
